title: Once a democrat voting for Hillary, now ... ': What J D Vance said about wife Usha
content: Usha Vance, wife of Ohio Senator JD Vance, shifted from supporting Hillary Clinton to embracing the MAGA agenda. Her transformation has drawn interest due to her Democratic roots and elite educational background. Usha's support and contributions have been significant in JD's political journey, highlighting her behind-the-scenes influence.

title: 'Censorship dispute': Elon Musk's X to close operations in Brazil
content: Elon Musk's social media platform X ceased operations in Brazil due to censorship orders from Judge Alexandre de Moraes. X claimed Moraes threatened one of its legal representatives with arrest unless they complied. This follows earlier orders to block accounts linked to spreading fake news and hate messages during former President Jair Bolsonaro's term.
summary: Elon Musk's social media platform X ceased operations in Brazil due to censorship orders from Judge Alexandre de Moraes. X claimed Moraes threatened one of its legal representatives with arrest unless they complied. This follows earlier orders to block accounts linked to spreading fake news and hate messages during former President Jair Bolsonaro's term.

title: 'Worked at McDonald’s ... ': Kamala Harris shares early life struggles, posts pic with mom
content: Kamala Harris shared her childhood's economic struggles and the challenges faced by her family, who were renters for most of her early life. She recounted her mother saving for over a decade to buy a home. Harris also discussed working at McDonald's during college. She promised to prioritize reducing living costs and increasing economic security if elected president.
summary: Kamala Harris shared her childhood's economic struggles and the challenges faced by her family, who were renters for most of her early life. She recounted her mother saving for over a decade to buy a home. Harris also discussed working at McDonald's during college. She promised to prioritize reducing living costs and increasing economic security if elected president.

title: US presidential elections: 'Hope' and 'progress' in America as Donald Trump totters
content: Shepard Fairey, known for the Obama 'hope' poster, released a similar Kamala Harris 'progress' poster for the current election. His endorsement of Harris and her running mate Tim Walz contrasts his past disappointment with Obama and refusal to support Clinton or Biden. Fairey found inspiration in Harris's campaign message: 'We are not going back.'

US presidential elections: Donald Trump drafts Tulsi Gabbard for debate preparation
content: Donald Trump enlisted former Democratic lawmaker Tulsi Gabbard to help him prepare for a debate against Kamala Harris. The move aimed to structure his campaign and regain support amid erratic behavior and declining poll numbers. Gabbard, aligned with Trump's views on national security, had clashed with Harris in a 2019 debate.

Gabbard, aligned with Trump's views on national security, had clashed with Harris in a 2019 debate.

title: 'Imagine explaining his wife': Mike Francesa slams Mets for 'Hawk Tuah Girl' first pitch
content: Mike Francesa criticised the New York Mets' decision to invite Hailey Welch for the first pitch at their game against the Oakland A's. Welch, known for a viral controversial remark, was invited on a camp day with young fans attending. Francesa questioned the team's marketing decision and speculated on possible repercussions for those responsible.

title: UFO sightings in Palmdale and Lancaster, California: Local residents share experiences on Ring Neighbors app
content: Residents of Palmdale and Lancaster, California, reported UFO sightings, sharing their experiences on the Ring Neighbors app. Local authorities have started investigating these intriguing claims. One resident described seeing a shooting star that zig-zagged in the sky. The sightings have sparked curiosity and discussions in the community. Authorities are looking into the validity of these reported sightings.

Authorities are looking into the validity of these reported sightings.

title: Kate Middleton 'Reevaluates' royal Duties amid health concerns: Uncertainty surrounds her future role
content: Kate Middleton, the Princess of Wales, had been reevaluating her royal duties as she continued her battle with cancer. Despite recent public appearances, such as Trooping the Colour and Wimbledon, concerns about her future role within the royal family persisted.

title: Around 100 firefighters tackle blaze at London's Somerset House; watch video
content: A fire broke out at Somerset House, central London, with around 125 firefighters and 20 fire engines controlling the blaze. The fire affected the building's roof, although artworks were safe. The London Fire Brigade said: "20 fire engines and around 125 firefighters have now been sent in response to the fire at Somerset House. Crews are tackling a fire located in part of the building's roof."
summary: A fire broke out at Somerset House, central London, with around 125 firefighters and 20 fire engines controlling the blaze. The London Fire Brigade said: "20 fire engines and around 125 firefighters have now been sent in response to the fire at Somerset House. Crews are tackling a fire located in part of the building's roof."

More than 18,700 mpox cases detected in Africa since January: Health agency
content: The African Union health agency reported 18,737 suspected or confirmed mpox cases in Africa this year, including 1,200 in one week. The Democratic Republic of Congo, hardest hit, saw 1,005 cases and 24 deaths recently. Across 12 African Union states, 3,101 confirmed and 15,636 suspected cases were reported, resulting in 541 deaths. WHO declared an international health emergency for the new Clade 1b strain.
summary: The African Union health agency reported 18,737 suspected or confirmed mpox cases in Africa this year, including 1,200 in one week. The Democratic Republic of Congo, hardest hit, saw 1,005 cases and 24 deaths recently. Across 12 African Union states, 3,101 confirmed and 15,636 suspected cases were reported, resulting in 541 deaths. WHO declared an international health emergency for the new Clade 1b strain.

title: After Anna Paulina Luna's bikini photo, Rep Lauren Boebert's stomach tattoo takes the spotlight
Turkey wildfires threaten homes and war memorials
content: Wildfires driven by strong winds threatened northwestern Turkey, including the Gallipoli battle site. A blaze in Izmir forced evacuations and destroyed homes. Efforts were hindered by high winds, but no casualties were reported. Flames also affected Canakkale and Bolu, with some areas evacuated. Scientists attribute rising wildfires to climate change.
summary: Wildfires driven by strong winds threatened northwestern Turkey, including the Gallipoli battle site. A blaze in Izmir forced evacuations and destroyed homes. Efforts were hindered by high winds, but no casualties were reported. Flames also affected Canakkale and Bolu, with some areas evacuated. Scientists attribute rising wildfires to climate change.
